response.summary:
Experienced  Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Functional programming, OOP, RP, Web Applications, REST, HTTP protocol, Java, Scala and Agile Methodologies. Strong engineering professional graduated from Universidad Nacional de Colombia. 

Recent Projects
Software developer from February 2020 to present 
Endava - Newspaper company Software Developer Perform bug fixes and create new functionalities of the different system components, including Escenic (CMS), CUE, automatic subtitle processor and systems that adapt external content to the content supported by Escenic Create documentation
Programming languages: Java, Go, typescript Technologies: Escenic,Kibana, Jenkins, crucible, postman Programming paradigms: OOP, FP Operating systems: Mac OS, Linux

Software developer, From March 2019 to February 2020
Central Platform Build Project, client – A platform was built exclusively for financial institutions to leverage the power of rewards to engage customers, increase loyalty, support communities and promote growth. The holistic platform solution allows financial institutions to provide rewards for credit cards, debit cards and account-based behavioral activities.

Responsibilities and achievements: 

    • Develop new functionalities
    • Develop new features
    • Fix bugs and errors
    • Task estimations


Programming languages: Java, Kotlin
Technologies: Spring framework, postgresql, Kibana, Jenkins, bitbucket, postman
Programming paradigms: Functional programming, OOP
Operating systems: Windows

Software developer, Endava Group project (September 2018 – January 2019)
Internal project used to create different RampUp boards according to the necessities of any discipline and project for the new joiners.
Responsibilities:
    • Develop new functionalities
    • Develop new features
    • Fix bugs and errors
    • Task estimations
 
Programming languages: Scala
Technologies: Akka, ScalaTest, Lagom framework, Cassandra, Apache kafka
Programming paradigms: Functional programming, OOP
Operating systems: Windows

company.name: EPAM Systems
company.description:
Since 1993, EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM) has leveraged its advanced software engineering heritage to become the foremost global digital transformation services provider – leading the industry in digital and physical product development and digital platform engineering services. Through its innovative strategy; integrated advisory, consulting, and design capabilities; and unique 'Engineering DNA,' EPAM's globally deployed hybrid teams help make the future real for clients and communities around the world by powering better enterprise, education and health platforms that connect people, optimize experiences, and improve people's lives. In 2021, EPAM was added to the S&P 500 and included among the list of Forbes Global 2000 companies.  

Selected by Newsweek as a 2021 and 2022 Most Loved Workplace, EPAM's global multi-disciplinary teams serve customers in more than 50 countries across six continents. As a recognized leader, EPAM is listed among the top 15 companies in Information Technology Services on the Fortune 1000 and ranked four times as the top IT services company on Fortune's 100 Fastest Growing Companies list. EPAM is also listed among Ad Age's top 25 World's Largest Agency Companies for three consecutive years, and Consulting Magazine named EPAM Continuum a top 20 Fastest Growing Firm.

Learn more at  www.epam.com.
